alert.note: Alert for Eddy (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:08PM MDT until August 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN EDDY...NORTHERN REEVES AND NORTHWESTERN LOVING COUNTIES... At 708 PM CDT/608 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Bluff Reservoir, or 30 miles southeast of Carlsbad, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Red Bluff Reservoir and Red Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
